433130.name: WarBirds Dogfights
433130.description:
WarBirds Dogfights 2026 is a WWII combat flight simulation game that allows you to fly and fight in Single Player missions or in Massively Multiplayer Online battles against human pilots in air-to-air combat. WarBirds Dogfights 2026 generates thousands of unique single player missions and at the same time allows players who want to battle human opponents to come online in the WarBirds TotalSims online game arenas.

 

WarBirds Dogfights 2026 is a classic simulation of single player World War II air-to-air combat simulation with thousands of unique combat missions in Solo play! WarBirds Dogfights 2026 features brand new flight models for many aircraft and allows you to control over 225 historical aircraft versions.

Players can participate in a full training with over 15 maneuvers to practice and train. WarBirds Dogfights 2026 features advancement scoring where players can advance from novice to WGFP, (World's Greatest Fighter Pilot), through a series of promotions and rank awards.

Each mission is all action. Each terrain is different. There are over 20 different large-scale air battle terrains set in historic battle areas around the world. Each of these battles has separate procedural generation systems:
-- North Africa (Tobruk and Tunisia)
-- Europe (from Battle of Britain to Battle over Germany)
-- The Pacific (Midway, South Pacific atolls, Philippines)
-- Western Russia

WarBirds Dogfights Pilots can participate in online historical events held on most Sunday nights at 2030 Hrs, New York City USA time. Recently these Pilots participated in events like, “Battle of Midway,” “Battle of Coral Sea,” “Battle of Britain" ,“B-17 Flying Fortresses over Occupied Europe”, and other historical events.

Players can also choose to play ONLINE for FREE during a 30-day period after Downloading WarBirds Dogfights in the TotalSims online arenas with all 225 vehicles available for Play. After the 30-day FREE trial, players can still play Online for FREE with six early combat aircraft including the Spitfire 1, the Bf-109B, a B-25 Bomber, Ju-52 troops transport, and one tank. Players can also purchase limited time passes or can set up a monthly subscription, to access all 225 aircraft and ground vehicles, plus special events and battle spaces.

Learn Real Aircraft Flying and Maneuvering Skills
Come learn to fly Fighters and Bombers of World War II both offline and online in WarBirds Dogfights 2026!

 

WarBirds Dogfights 2026 is a Simulation and Strategy game from iEntertainment Network, INC., (OTCID: IENT).  A Public company whose Team has developed over 250 successful simulation and strategy games and sold over 300 million copies worldwide, including Sid Meier’s Civilization, M1 Tank Platoon, iF-22 Raptor, F-117 Stealth Fighter, Silent Service, WarBirds, and many more great games.

 

 


Salute and Check Six!
